transport.question: I have wheels and go on the road, many people ride inside. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 I carry lots of friends
🛑 I stop at bus stops
🛣️ You can ride me on the street.

transport.question: I float on the water and help people travel across the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I sail on the ocean
⚓ I might carry pirates
🚢 I'm bigger than a rowboat.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to faraway places. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I soar through the air
💺 I have lots of seats inside
✈️ I am faster than a car.

transport.question: I run on tracks and carry many people, sometimes underground. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I might travel under a city
📣 I make a loud 'choo choo' noise
🛤️ I follow a metal path

transport.question: I have two wheels and you pedal to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 You use your feet to move me
🔔 I have a bell to warn people
🏞️ You might ride me in the park.

transport.question: I help you zoom down a snowy hill. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You use me in cold weather
🧤 You might wear gloves while using me
⛷️ I glide on the snow.

transport.question: I carry astronauts to space. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I travel very, very fast
👩‍🚀 People wear special suits inside me
🪐 I go beyond Earth

transport.question: I am a car that can help when there is a fire. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I am a special kind of car
🔥 I help put out fires
🚨 I have a loud siren and flashing lights

transport.question: I can land on water, but I am also an airplane. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I am kind of like a bird
🌊 I can float
🛬 I don't need a runway to land

transport.question: I help farmers grow food, and have big wheels and an engine. What am I?

hints.text: 🚜 I work on a farm
🌽 I help to plow fields
🌱 I'm not very fast, but very strong

plant.question: I have a stem, leaves, and sometimes pretty colors. I need water and sunshine to grow tall. What am I?

hints.text: 🌷 You can find me in a garden or a vase.
💧 I need water to stay alive.
☀️ I like to face the sun.

plant.question: I am big and tall, with a trunk and many leaves. Birds like to build nests in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 Squirrels like to climb on me.
🍂 My leaves change color in the fall.
🪵 You can make furniture from my wood.

plant.question: I am long, orange, and crunchy. Rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I am orange, but can be other colors too.
🥗 I am a vegetable.
🧑‍🍳 You can eat me raw or cooked.

plant.question: I have a hard shell and grow on trees. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌴 I grow in warm places.
🥛 You can drink my milk.
🍫 Sometimes I'm covered in chocolate.

plant.question: I am a prickly plant that lives in the desert. I can store lots of water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌵 I have sharp needles instead of leaves.
🏜️ I like hot and dry weather.
💧 I don't need much water.

plant.question: I am a small, round fruit that grows in bunches. I can be green, red, or purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🍇 You can make juice or jelly from me.
🪴 I grow on a vine.
🍷 Adults use me to make wine.

plant.question: I am a vegetable with many layers. I can make you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I have a strong smell.
🍔 I can be added to many dishes.
🔪 Be careful when cutting me!

plant.question: I am a plant that grows in water. Ducks like to swim around me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦢 I have large, flat leaves that float.
🐸 Frogs like to sit on me.
🌸 I can have beautiful flowers.

plant.question: I am a tall plant whose seeds can be ground to make flour or eaten off the cob. You can pop me and eat me at the movies too! What am I?

hints.text: 🌽 I grow in fields.
🐾 Animals like to eat me
🍿 You can pop me and eat me at the movies.

plant.question: I am a leafy green that isn't a tree, but grows very closely to the ground. People use me to make teas or season dishes. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I can smell nice
🫖 I can be used to make drinks
👨‍🍳 I make food taste better
